title: LF ODYSSEY Team
body:
Looking for some skilled players to join my team as we undertake the challenge of the HARD, VERY HARD and INSANE odyssey missions as well as participating in the Odyssey challenge (see oce community board). Experience is preferred either from league rank, past PvE event to raiding experience.

Message me in game, summoner name : Throst

EDIT : Had enough people contact me, so group now full.
